name: Five Nights at Freddy's Girls
description:
hello it's always me Marco omitted five night at freddy's girls also on itch.io five night at Freddy's girls do not be fooled by the silicone suit, these animatronics have no tact and therefore can suffocate you without problems survive 5 nights with these animatronics in a restaurant, probably not suitable for children, and arrives at the weekend alive the game is simple, you see an animatronic at the door ... closed, simpler than that 

game make by Marco 

model by nightbotgrey
